root.TEXT:
Record date: 2085-10-30
Narrative History
The patient is here today for the following issues:
1. Patient is pregnant. No bleeding or cramping. Followed by Dr. Kilgore. She did not intend to get pregnant again but would like to keep this pregnancy. 2. Labs in past indicated hyperthyroidism. This is being followed by endocrine. No palpitations.
3. DM - Has not been taking insulin since birth of son. HgA1C >10. She will be seen by Endocrine today.
4. Followed by Dr. Uzzell for CAD. No chest pain. On atenolol, aspirin and imdur.
Problems
Diabetes mellitus
S/P Abortion : SPONTANEOUS 4/80
Chlamydia : CERVICITIS-TREATED
H/O Abnormal pap test : '76 S/P COLPOSCOPY IN PAST; RECENT PAP NORMAL
Positive PPD : NEG CXR
PARONYCHIAL INFECTION : LEFT HAND 78
Ectopic pregnancy : 74
Coronary artery disease
Anemia
Shortness of breath
Hypertension
Gastroesophageal reflux disease
Elevated cholesterol
Hyperthyroidism
Obesity
Review of Systems
Unless mentioned in the history above the following ROS were asked and are negative: Constitutional, Respiratory, Cardiac, GI, Endocrine, Musculoskeletal.
Medications
Asa (ACETYLSALICYLIC Acid) 325MG TABLET take 1 Tablet(s) PO QD
Natalcare Plus 1TAB PO qd
ATENOLOL 100MG TABLET take 1 Tablet(s) PO QD
Imdur (ISOSORBIDE MONONIT.(SR)) 30MG TABLET CR 24HR take 1 Tablet(s) PO QD
Allergies
NKA
Social History
NP in Laplace - waiting for researcher job.
Son born in 2085 name Uri, older child
Vital Signs
BLOOD PRESSURE 122/70
WEIGHT 220 lb
AGE 32y5.7m
Physical Exam
GENERAL: Healthy appearing
Labs reviewed.
Assessment and Plan
1. Pregnancy - Counseled patient- especially on need to control sugars. Limited weight gain. She will discuss with ob and cardiology when to stop aspirin. She will likely be induced early.
2. Hyperthyroidism - Denies symptoms- repeat today Follow up with Dr. Kirkpatrick.
3. DM - Followed by diabetes clinic. HgA1C> 10 . Will need to restart insulin - counseled.
4. CAD - On atenolol, asa, imdur. Followed by Dr. Uzzell.
25 minutes spent with the patient - the majority counseling on above.
